languages.text: "Вот спасибочки! Выкуси, батюшка! Думал меня без гроша оставить? Как бы не так! Выпью сегодня пару-другую бутылок за то, чтоб тебе пусто было на том свете".

"Yes, thank you! Tough luck, daddy dearest! Thought you'd leave me high and dry? Fat chance! I'll drink myself a bottle or two tonight and hope you blow your stack out there, wherever the damn you are."
languages.original_text: "Вот спасибочки! Выкуси, батюшка! Думал меня без гроша оставить? Как бы не так! Выпью сегодня пару-другую бутылок за то, чтоб тебе пусто было на том свете".

traits.locale_text: "Yes, thank you! Tough luck, dear father! Thought you'd leave me high and dry? Fat chance! I'll drink myself a bottle or two tonight and hope you blow your stack out there, wherever the damn you are."

"Yes, thank you! Tough luck, dear father! Thought you'd leave me high and dry? Fat chance! I'll drink myself a bottle or two tonight and hope you blow your stack out there, wherever the damn you are."

"Yes, thank you! Tough luck, daddy dearest! Thought you'd leave me high and dry? Fat chance! I'll drink myself a bottle or two tonight and hope you blow your stack out there, wherever the damn you are."

"Yes, thank you! Tough luck, daddy dearest! Thought you'd leave me high and dry? Fat chance! I'll drink myself a bottle or two tonight and hope you blow your stack out there, wherever the damn you are."

"Yes, thank you! Tough luck, daddy dearest! Thought you'd leave me high and dry? Fat chance! I'll drink myself a bottle or two tonight and hope you blow your stack out there, wherever the damn you are."

languages.text: “太棒了，谢谢你！祝你好运，亲爱的老爹！你以为你把我扔在那里不管就行了吗？我可去你的吧！我今晚要好好喝上两瓶！虽然不知道你他妈会去什么地方，但我真希望能把你气活过来。”
languages.original_text: "Yes, thank you! Tough luck, daddy dearest! Thought you'd leave me high and dry? Fat chance! I'll drink myself a bottle or two tonight and hope you blow your stack out there, wherever the damn you are."

traits.locale_text: “太棒了，谢谢你！祝你好运，亲爱的老爹！你以为你把我扔在那里不管就行了吗？我可去你的吧！我今晚要好好喝上两瓶！虽然不知道你他妈会去什么地方，但我真希望能把你气活过来。”

languages.text: "Ja, danke! Pech gehabt, lieber Vater! Ihr dachtet, Ihr könntet mich hängen lassen? Von wegen! Ich trinke heute ein oder zwei Flaschen und hoffe, dass Ihr dort richtig ausrastet, wo Ihr auch seid."
languages.original_text: "Yes, thank you! Tough luck, daddy dearest! Thought you'd leave me high and dry? Fat chance! I'll drink myself a bottle or two tonight and hope you blow your stack out there, wherever the damn you are."

traits.locale_text: "Ja, danke! Pech gehabt, lieber Vater! Ihr dachtet, Ihr könntet mich hängen lassen? Von wegen! Ich trinke heute ein oder zwei Flaschen und hoffe, dass Ihr dort richtig ausrastet, wo Ihr auch seid."

languages.text: « Oui, merci ! Pas de chance, cher papa ! Tu croyais me spolier, hein ? Eh ben c'est raté ! Je vais me siffler une ou deux bouteilles ce soir dans l'espoir que tu piétines de rage, où que tu sois ! »
languages.original_text: "Yes, thank you! Tough luck, daddy dearest! Thought you'd leave me high and dry? Fat chance! I'll drink myself a bottle or two tonight and hope you blow your stack out there, wherever the damn you are."

traits.locale_text: « Oui, merci ! Pas de chance, cher papa ! Tu croyais me spolier, hein ? Eh ben c'est raté ! Je vais me siffler une ou deux bouteilles ce soir dans l'espoir que tu piétines de rage, où que tu sois ! »

languages.text: «¡Sí, gracias! ¡Te jorobas, papaíto! ¿Creías que me ibas a dejar en la estacada? ¡Pues no! Esta noche beberé una o dos botellas, y por mí, puedes pudrirte dondequiera que estés».
languages.original_text: "Yes, thank you! Tough luck, daddy dearest! Thought you'd leave me high and dry? Fat chance! I'll drink myself a bottle or two tonight and hope you blow your stack out there, wherever the damn you are."

traits.locale_text: «¡Sí, gracias! ¡Te jorobas, papaíto! ¿Creías que me ibas a dejar en la estacada? ¡Pues no! Esta noche beberé una o dos botellas, y por mí, puedes pudrirte dondequiera que estés».

languages.text: 「ありがとう！幸運を祈るよ、親愛なるパパ！俺を見捨てるつもりだったか？まさか！今夜俺はボトル1、2本を飲み干すから、お前が何処か適当な場所でカンカンに怒っていればいいさ」
languages.original_text: "Yes, thank you! Tough luck, daddy dearest! Thought you'd leave me high and dry? Fat chance! I'll drink myself a bottle or two tonight and hope you blow your stack out there, wherever the damn you are."

traits.locale_text: 「ありがとう！幸運を祈るよ、親愛なるパパ！俺を見捨てるつもりだったか？まさか！今夜俺はボトル1、2本を飲み干すから、お前が何処か適当な場所でカンカンに怒っていればいいさ」

languages.text: "Kesinlikle, sağ olasınız! Şansına küs canım babacığım! Beni dımdızlak ortada bırakacaktın, he? Rüyanda görürsün! Bu akşam senin şerefine birkaç şişe yuvarlayacağım. Umarım her neredeysen sinirden küplere binersin!"
languages.original_text: "Yes, thank you! Tough luck, daddy dearest! Thought you'd leave me high and dry? Fat chance! I'll drink myself a bottle or two tonight and hope you blow your stack out there, wherever the damn you are."

traits.locale_text: "Evet, teşekkürler! Şansına küs canım babacığım! Beni beş parasız bırakabileceğini mi düşünmüştün? Hiç şansın yok! Bu akşam senin şerefine birkaç şişe yuvarlayacağım. Umarım her neredeysen sinirden küplere binersin!"
